alfredsnippet.snippet:
Wal Thornhill. Thoth Newsletter VOL I, No, 25, November 3, 1997

"Since the impact theory is wrong and the nebular hypothesis of the formation of the solar system is patently absurd, NASA has not even begun to ask the right questions -- let alone find answers about our beginnings."
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - NASA Has Not Even Begun to Ask the Right Questions
